name: BraveKnight2d
description:
BraveKnight2d - Brave knight 2d is a platform game in which you have to help the main character: a knight.
Once in one small province, there was a disaster.
In this kingdom lived a king with his son.And this king had a son who decided to become a knight.
The knight studied for a very long time, but he could not become a knight.
Once the kingdom was invaded by enemies and captured it.And only a knight can save the kingdom.
